name: Grasshopper Mate OS 1.0 32-bit
short_description:
Portable Linux-based operating systems for everyone. Comes pre-loaded with essential tools and applications to provide a full, ready to use plug and play operating system. Loaded entirely from a USB thumb drive without any installation necessary, alternatively could be also installed onto a computer.

Grasshopper OS saves the hassle of installations and alters that usually needed in other operating systems. 

Offers both an un-persistent fail safe system, that always comes back to its default state, providing a very stable environment and worry free for computer beginners. And a persistent mode which allowing for changes and file saving upon the USB thumb drive. 
With Grasshopper you can perform all your everyday tasks and more. Comes pre-installed with internet applications, multimedia, photo and video editing, over 30 games and allot more. 

For more indormation and
instructions, visit: www.grasshopperos.com

64-bit version available here: https://sourceforge.net/projects/g
summary: Grasshopper Operating Systems - Portable operating systems
